name: Everithing is FIne
description:
The game was made for the Game makers toolkit game jam 2020.

All the assets where done by me except the audio that was from soniss game audio GDC bundle also for the music i used Filmstro Pro, the assets where made in blender and painted in substance, this is a solo project and all i manage to do was one stage, your light-gun is not reliable as some other parts of the stage,have fun :)
